channel.title: Events on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics
channel.description: Recent content in Events on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics

item.title: Webinar: Pakistan’s Strategic Position in a Multipolar World
item.description: A focused webinar examining Pakistan’s role in the emerging multipolar order.

item.title: Briefing: Political Risk Outlook 2025
item.description: Scenario-based briefing on Pakistan’s political and regulatory risk landscape for 2025.

item.title: Workshop: Education, Curriculum & National Capacity
item.description: Hands-on workshop aligning curriculum reform and leadership pipelines with national capacity goals.

item.title: PCEC: Risks and Opportunities in a Fragmenting Energy Market
item.description: A SIPEG webinar unpacking the Pakistan-China Energy Corridor and its regional ramifications.
